name: Sweet Melee
description:
In this competitive multiplayer game, you have to follow the rules and complete some objectives to win and defeat your opponents.

The prototype was made during the Game, Sun & Jam organized by Game IN. The theme was : "Obey must be a pleasure"

Team : Maxime Meriaux, Adrien Pietras, Wyssiam Sahbani, Gauthier Bassée, Maxime Szczypa et Pierre Stempin
